mapper.sql: a.warnLoseId AS "warnLoseId", a.departmentId AS "departmentId", a.officeId AS "officeId", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.collectNumber AS "collectNumber", a.trashId AS "trashId", a.weight AS "weight", a.collectId AS "collectId", a.collectTime AS "collectTime", a.putInTime AS "putInTime", a.warnTime AS "warnTime", a.createDate AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_warn_lose a ORDER BY a.createDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_warn_lose( warnLoseId, departmentId, officeId, code, status, collectNumber, trashId, weight, collectId, collectTime, putInTime, warnTime, createDate, remarks ) VALUES ( #{warnLoseId}, #{departmentId}, #{officeId}, #{code}, #{status}, #{collectNumber}, #{trashId}, #{weight}, #{collectId}, #{collectTime}, #{putInTime}, #{warnTime}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_warn_lose SET departmentId = #{departmentId}, officeId = #{officeId}, code = #{code}, status = #{status}, collectNumber = #{collectNumber}, trashId = #{trashId}, weight = #{weight}, collectId = #{collectId}, collectTime = #{collectTime}, putInTime = #{putInTime}, warnTime = #{warnTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE warnLoseId = #{warnLoseId}
